data.actual_result: Toast shows minimum password length to be 6 in one case and 1 in another
data.expected_result: Toast should either say the minimum length of password to be 6 (more suitably) or 1
data.short_description: Toast asking for correct input password length varies when entering a really long password in current password field and when entering a single letter password in new password field in account settings>change password
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user settings>change password - First, click on change password and in current password text field, type a really long password (anything longer that 128 characters). Click on change password and notice the toast saying "must be between 1 and 128 in length" - Now go back, click on change password again, and enter a password in current password (not long, for example type sjsjdkdkd) and in new password type a single letter (for example "a"), click on change password and notice the toast saying "password must be 6-128 characters long"
